Welcome!

My name is Peter and I've been working in technology for over fifteen years, in roles ranging from engineer to CTO to Product Manager. Throughout this time I've learned alot about what does and doesn't work in the technology industry, and have created this blog to share my experiences, foster discussion, and provide a platform where we can all learn from one another.

  • Evolutionary Agile
  • Live Rapid Prototyping
  • Effective Prototyping, Visualization
  • The Product Gimmick
ABOUT THE AUTHOR

Hi, I'm Peter. I help people build products. I also do a double somersault on the Flying Trapeze.
